attributes.additional_details: We petition that the two key persons with the experience to meet the demands of the mob hell- bent on destroying our way of life for their own criminal gain, namely Sir Paul Stephenson and Asst. Commissioner John Yates, be re-instated immediately to counter-act the damage being done to our society. Both showed honourable behaviour with their resignations but we can ill afford to lose men of their standing. WE NEED THEM RIGHT AWAY!
